title: 5 Days MongoDB Workshop
description: This workshop is designed to provide a comprehensive introduction to MongoDB.

days.title: Introduction to MongoDB
days.notes: Introduction to MongoDB, its installation, and setup.

days.title: MongoDB Basics
days.notes: Understanding collections, documents, and basic CRUD operations.

days.title: Advanced MongoDB Queries
days.notes: Diving into advanced query operations and indexing in MongoDB.

days.title: Integrating MongoDB with Node.js
days.notes: Setting up a Node.js server and integrating MongoDB with it.

days.title: Building a Full-stack Application
days.notes: Building a full-stack application using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

title: 7 Days React Basics Workshop
description: A complete guide to getting started with React.js.

days.title: Introduction to React
days.notes: Introduction to React and setting up the development environment.

days.title: State Management
days.notes: Managing state with useState and useReducer.

days.title: Handling Events and Forms
days.notes: Handling events and managing forms in React.

days.title: React Router Basics
days.notes: Introduction to React Router for handling navigation.

days.title: Working with APIs
days.notes: Fetching data from APIs using React.

days.title: Deploying React Apps
days.notes: Deploying React applications on various platforms.

title: 3 Days Docker Crash Course
description: Learn Docker fundamentals and containerization in 3 days.

days.title: Introduction to Docker
days.notes: Introduction to Docker, installation, and container basics.

days.title: Working with Docker Images and Containers
days.notes: Creating and managing Docker images and containers.

days.title: Docker Compose and Orchestration
days.notes: Using Docker Compose and understanding container orchestration.

title: 4 Days Data Science with Python Workshop
description: Master the basics of data science and analytics using Python.

days.title: Python for Data Science
days.notes: Introduction to Python and its use in data science.

days.title: Data Manipulation with Pandas
days.notes: Learning data manipulation and analysis using Pandas.

days.title: Final Project and Presentation
days.notes: Applying learned skills to a final data science project.
